thread.title: Excellent hotel in a fantastic location for theatre goers
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in a fantastic location for theatre goers - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mel H
title: Excellent hotel in a fantastic location for theatre goers
text: Fabulous room (upgraded to a four poster as we arrived), amazing cheerful and very helpful staff. All that as well as being perfectly located for theatres and China Town, you couldn't ask for more from a hotel.
